clip.quote: Dual agency is the scourge of our industry... I won't represent a buyer on this transaction.
clip.why_clipworthy: Challenges a common industry practice and highlights ethical considerations.
clip.suggested_hook: Why dual agency might be hurting your real estate business.

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "Why dual agency might be hurting your real estate business.",
    "SETUP": "Michael B. Bell challenges a common practice in real estate, urging agents to reconsider dual agency for ethical reasons.",
    "INSIGHT": "Dual agency often puts agents in a conflict of interest, compromising their ability to fully advocate for either party. Michael refuses to represent buyers in such transactions, emphasizing the importance of integrity.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "By avoiding dual agency, you can build trust and credibility, ensuring clients feel fully represented. This approach can differentiate you in a competitive market.",
    "CTA": "Consider your stance on dual agency. How might changing it impact your business ethics and client relationships?"
  },
  "caption": "Is dual agency compromising your integrity? Michael B. Bell shares why he avoids it. #RealEstateEthics",

  "content_pillar": "real_talk"
}
```
